摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

org.zyp.cn8583
类 cnMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.zyp.cn8583.cnMessage

public class cnMessage
extends java.lang.Object

这是一个中国版的8583格式标准的类，初始代码来源于IsoMessage类。 This is the core class of the framework. Contains the bitmap which is modified as fields are added/removed. This class makes no assumptions as to what types belong in each field, nor what fields should each different message type have; that is left for the developer

作者：
zyplanke

构造方法详细信息

cnMessage

public cnMessage()

cnMessage

public cnMessage(java.lang.String msgtypeid,
                 int headerlength)
Creates a new message with the specified 8583 header attributes .

参数：
headerlength - 报文头（整个报文头）的长度（单位字节）
方法详细信息

getmsgHeader

public byte[] getmsgHeader()
Returns the 8583 total header that this message was created with.

setMessageHeaderData

public boolean setMessageHeaderData(int startindex,
                                    byte[] data)
设置报文头的数据，由于不同的报文报文的格式完全不同，所以直接设置报文的字节数据。

参数：
startindex - 待设置报文头的起始字节位置。（0为第一个位置）
data - 要设置的数据，（长度为data的长度，startindex和data的长度的和应小于报文头的总长度）
返回：
是否设置成功

getMessageHeaderData

public byte[] getMessageHeaderData(int startindex,
                                   int count)
从报文头中取得数据

参数：
startindex - 起始字节位置（0为第一个位置，应小于报文头的总长度）
count - 需要取得的字节数（正整数） 如遇到报文尾，则取得实际能取道的最大字节数
返回：
取得的数据（如未取得则返回null）

setMsgTypeID

public void setMsgTypeID(java.lang.String msgtypeid)
Sets the 8583 message type id. 应该为4字节字符串

getMsgTypeID

public java.lang.String getMsgTypeID()
Returns the 8583 message type id.

setBinary

public void setBinary(boolean flag)
Indicates whether the message should be binary. Default is false. 如果设置为true, 报文中的各报文域按照二进制组成报文。(报文头、报文类型标示和位图不受影响) 对于中国的8583报文，一般应该设置为false。

isBinary

public boolean isBinary()
Returns true if the message is binary coded; default is false. 如果为true, 报文中的各报文域按照二进制组成报文。(报文头、报文类型标示和位图不受影响)

setEtx

public void setEtx(int value)
Sets the ETX character, which is sent at the end of the message as a terminator. Default is -1, which means no terminator is sent.

getObjectValue

public java.lang.Object getObjectValue(int fieldid)
Returns the stored value in the field, without converting or formatting it.

参数：
fieldid - The field number. 1 is the secondary bitmap and is not returned as such; real fields go from 2 to 128.

getField

public cnValue<?> getField(int fieldid)
Returns the cnValue for the specified field.

参数：
fieldid - 应该在2-128范围

setField

public void setField(int fieldid,
                     cnValue<?> field)
Stored the field in the specified index. The first field is the secondary bitmap and has index 1, so the first valid value for index must be 2.

setValue

public void setValue(int fieldid,
                     java.lang.Object value,
                     cnType t,
                     int length)
Sets the specified value in the specified field, creating an cnValue internally.

参数：
fieldid - The field number (2 to 128)
value - The value to be stored.
t - The 8583 cntype.
length - The length of the field, used for ALPHA and NUMERIC values only, ignored with any other type.

hasField

public boolean hasField(int fieldid)
Returns true is the message has a value in the specified field.

参数：
fieldid - The field id.

write

public void write(java.io.OutputStream outs,
                  int lengthBytes,
                  int radixoflengthBytes)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes a message to a stream, after writing the specified number of bytes indicating the message's length. The message will first be written to an internal memory stream which will then be dumped into the specified stream. This method flushes the stream after the write. There are at most three write operations to the stream: one for the length header, one for the message, and the last one with for the ETX.

参数：
outs - The stream to write the message to.
lengthBytes - The size of the message tatol length header. Valid ranges are 2 to 4. （报文长度头，一搬4个字节）
radixoflengthBytes - 表示整个报文长度的字节（lengthBytes）的表示进制（只能取10或16）
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified length header is more than 4 bytes.
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the stream.

writeToBuffer

public java.nio.ByteBuffer writeToBuffer(int lengthBytes)
Creates and returns a ByteBuffer with the data of the message, including the length header. The returned buffer is already flipped, so it is ready to be written to a Channel.

writeInternal

protected byte[] writeInternal()
Writes the message to a memory buffer and returns it. The message does not include the ETX character or the header length.

estimatetotalmsglength

public int estimatetotalmsglength()
根据当前的报文内容，估计最终报文的的长度（单位为字节）

返回：
估算出来的报文字节个数（含报文头、报文类型标示、位图和各个有效的报文域）
